content: this was a request from a customer on shopify to go along with cranky or grandpa kong the pattern for funky kong is a borrowed pattern of donkey kong with a few added accents funky kong ファンキーコング fankī kongu in japan is a recurring character in the donkey kong series funky often serves as an ally to the kong family by offering services such as his transportation and weaponry he is a helpful and happily willing ally to the series titular hero and has proven his worth on numerous occasions materials worsted weight yarn cafe latte buff taupe white delft blue black red and dark amethyst b crochet hook polyester fiberfil tapestry needle cardboard glue elastic cord floral wire
